description: Source code for a Flutter screen named DeliveryHistoryScreen which displays delivery history with styled header and rows.

classes.name: DeliveryHistoryScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the delivery history screen with a scaffold containing an app bar and list view.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A private stateless widget that builds the styled header section with a gradient background, icon, and title text.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A private stateless widget that builds individual list items with icon and text, styled with decoration.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for each widget: DeliveryHistoryScreen, _Header, _Row.
